content: Hi all, is there a way of telling what the registry will think about the name of a new package - i.e. a tool to assess whether a name is too close to an existing name and requires manual intervention? I don't now whether I can run the name checker myself, basically...
I think you can use the RegistryCI.jl package for this as described here: https://juliaregistries.github.io/RegistryCI.jl/stable/guidelines/#Name-similarity-distance-check
Richard Reeve has marked this topic as resolved.
